text:
@realDonaldTrump #PoliceUnions have long history of resistance to change and have had a great “friend” in the @whiteHouse. Only fools, despots like Trump, Sessions, Barr, and Lt. Bob Kroll r too blinded to see that one videotaped racist killing is the lit match. 

https://t.co/sbPr2Da6SF
